messages.message:
Sr Back-end Principle Engineer - Tempe

Hi Brian,

Eric Posner here with Tech Finders in Phoenix. I noticed you are open to opportunities for the new year and I am interested in connecting with you.

I am working with a client in Tempe that is seeking several Principle Engineers (Java or C#) to assist with back-end integrations of several systems for a new platform they are building. 

These are Direct Hire, on-site roles that offer great benefits, competitive salaries, and a great culture.

Thanks for you time and I look forward to hearing back from you.

Eric Posner, CPC
480-342-9900 | eric@aztechfinders.com
